sentences.en: A child's day is filled with fascination, newness and wonder.
sentences.cn: 孩子的一天充满了魅力、新奇和惊奇。

sentences.en: He simply doesn't discriminate when it comes to the newness of tools.
sentences.cn: 当谈到工具的新奇性时，他就是不加区别。

sentences.en: Now I live "in newness of life."
sentences.cn: 现在我在“新生命”里得活。
